com.envibe.envibe.controller

Class AuthenticationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.envibe.envibe.controller.AuthenticationController

  • @Controller
public class AuthenticationController
extends Object
    Handles all endpoints related to authentication and session modification.

    ARMmaster17

        @InitBinder
public void initBinder(org.springframework.web.bind.WebDataBinder binder)
        Injected binding pattern to allow us to use HTML5 date formats.
        Parameters:

      • login

        @GetMapping(value="/login")
public String login(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                @RequestParam(value="error",required=false)
                                                String error,
                                                @RequestParam(value="logout",required=false)
                                                String logout)
        Render endpoint for the login page.
        Parameters:
        model - Object used to pass parameters to Thymeleaf template.
        error - List of errors carried over from previously failed POST request.
        logout - Flag raised when user is redirected from a successful session invalidation at /logout. See logout(Model, HttpServletRequest).
        Returns:
        Reference to the login.html template.

      • logout

        @GetMapping(value="/logout")
public String logout(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Endpoint that handles session invalidation.
        Parameters:
        model - Object used to pass parameters to Thymeleaf template.
        request - Proxy object to manipulate cookies and other session data.
        Returns:
        Redirects to /login with the logout flag. See login(Model, String, String).

      • registration

        @GetMapping(value="/register")
public String registration(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        Render endpoint for the registration page.
        Parameters:
        model - Object used to pass parameters to Thymeleaf template.
        Returns:
        Reference to the register.html template.

      • registerUser

        @PostMapping(value="/register")
public String registerUser(@ModelAttribute
                                                           User userDto,
                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                           org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
        Endpoint that handles user validation and registration.
        Parameters:
        userDto - Data transfer object that contains the raw new user data.
        request - Proxy object to manipulate cookies and other session data.
        errors - List of errors carried over from previously failed POST request.
        Returns:
        Redirect to /login on success, otherwise back to /register with error flag (not yet implemented).
        See Also:
        UserRegistrationService.registerNewUserAccount(User)
